data.message: Fix policy_gate type error: Added defensive type checking to policy_gate.py: (1) compute_args_hash now handles non-dict arguments gracefully, (2) create_safe_summary returns early with type indicator for non-dict, (3) policy_gate normalizes non-dict arguments to {_raw: str} with warning log. Prevents 'str object has no attribute get' errors.
data.outcome: Added defensive type checking to policy_gate.py: (1) compute_args_hash now handles non-dict arguments gracefully, (2) create_safe_summary returns early with type indicator for non-dict, (3) policy_gate normalizes non-dict arguments to {_raw: str} with warning log. Prevents 'str object has no attribute get' errors.
